summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 0.5 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 171 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 889 m), rainfall (down 0.1 mm), and inside temperature (up 1.7°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 170.9m lower than yesterday, 13.8m lower than the past week, 888.9m lower than the past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 745m and a peak of 3580m, averaging 1815.5m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.
cloud levels.summary: The clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, humidity should not be a concern. Some rain can be expected, the clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected, and sunlight will be very intense and bright. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
